alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 4:08PM AKST until December 25 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Bristol Bay from King Salmon north. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions and icy roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will start out as snow initially before quickly mixing with or changing over to freezing rain overnight on Friday. Areas north and west of Dillingham and King Salmon are expected to see the highest ice accumulations. Warming temperatures will switch precipitation over to all rain from southwest to northeast by Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
